abstracts.cdata!:
Found in this report are president’s
            memorandum entitled: “Lessons Learned from Narmada" and
            accompanying report entitled "Bankwide Lessons Learned
            from the Experience with the India Sardar Sarovar (Narmada)
            Project.” The note sums up the main lessons which may be
            drawn from what is known at the time of the project about
            the subject. It is based on a review of the files in the
            Asia Information Center and on interviews with more than 30
            persons. All were associated directly with the project
            and/or developments leading up to the independent review. A
            list of persons interviewed, policy basis for projects, and
            suggestions for improvement of quality at entry are attached
            as separate attachments at the end.
